name: Powering Down
description:
You’re piloting a highly-adaptable ship through an underground base full of hostile drones and turrets. You’ll need to adjust power to your ships system while destroying or avoiding the base’s defenses.

Thrusters, shields, weapons, and anti-grav all pull from the same pool of energy. Turning all systems on full makes you nearly invincible, but winning a battle doesn’t matter if you can’t make it to the next charging station.

This game was made for Ludum Dare 39.  Rate it here!
